name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor
display_help: Dark Armor allows you to tap into the powers of the Netherworld for protection. Many Dark Armor powers drain your foes to strengthen you. Dark Armor offers very good resistance to Negative Energy damage, and is one of the only defensive sets that offer some resistance to Psionic damage. However. its resistance to Energy is weak and it offers no protection to Knockback.

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor.Dark_Embrace
powers.display_help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage. This Dark Embrace shrouds you and grants resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. Recharge: Fast

display_info: 22.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to negative energy damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to negative energy damage, toxic damage for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor.Death_Shroud
powers.display_help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor.Defracting_cloud
powers.display_help: You create a Murky Cloud enshrouding you. This cloud can absorb all forms of energy, making you more resistant to Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks, as well as Endurance Drain effects. Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, End Drain)

display_info: 22.50% resistance to fire damage, cold damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
22.50% resistance to fire damage, cold damage for 0.75s on self
15.00% resistance to energy damage, negative energy damage for 0.75s on self
69.20% resistance to endurance debuff, recovery rate debuff for 0.75s on target

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor.Obsidian_Shield
powers.display_help: You can create a special Obsidian Shield that grants good resistance to Psionic damage. With your mind enshrouded in darkness you are protected from Sleep, Fear, Hold and Disorient attacks. Recharge: Fast
powers.display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Psionic, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear)

display_info: 37.50% resistance to psionic damage for 0.75s on self
-10.4 terrorize protection, hold protection, stun protection, sleep protection for 0.75s on self
37.50% resistance to psionic damage for 0.75s on self
103.80% resistance to terrorize, hold, stun, sleep for 0.75s on self
30.00% resistance to defense debuff, to hit debuff, recharge debuff for 0.75s on self
50.00% resistance to run speed debuff, fly speed debuff, jump speed debuff, jump height debuff for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor.Dark_Regeneration
powers.display_help: You can tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, thus healing yourself. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor.Cloak_of_Darkness
powers.display_help: A shroud of Netherworld darkness envelops you, making you difficult to spot at a distance. You can be seen only at close range, or if you attack a target. Even if seen, the Cloak of Darkness grants you a bonus to Defense to all attacks and some protection from Immobilization. This Netherworld Cloak also allows you to see things in a new light, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Unlike some stealth powers, Cloak of Darkness has no movement penalty. Cloak of Darkness will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 60.00% resistance to perception radius debuff for 0.75s on self
3.75% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 0.75s on self
3.75% strength to ranged, melee, AoE, smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy, negative energy, psionic, unique for 0.75s on self
103.80% resistance to immobilize for 0.75s on self

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor.Cloak_of_Fear
powers.display_help: You can wrap yourself in a nightmarish Cloak of Fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, at a reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor.Oppressive_Gloom
powers.display_help: The Netherworld has many mutable properties, such as the Oppressive Gloom. This power allows you to use your own Hit Points to keep enemies near you Disoriented and unable to use any powers. Endurance cost for this is minimal, but the power can be dangerous to use. Recharge: Moderate

powers.name: Scrapper_Defense.Dark_Armor.Soul_Transfer
powers.display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can perform a Soul Transfer, sucking the life force of all foes around you to bring yourself back from the brink of death. The more foes nearby, the more life is restored to you. Drained foes are left Disoriented. The dark effects of this Soul Transfer will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 90 seconds. There must be at least one foe nearby to fuel the Transfer and revive yourself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

display_info: 1 ticks of 289.14 heal for 0.5s on self
